Thomas Lab

Statistical computing, data science, and R programming

1 Welcome

I’m Ronald G. Thomas, a researcher and data scientist focused on statistical methods, reproducible research, and computational tools. I write about R programming, statistical analysis, research workflows, and modern data science practices.

This site organizes content into focused areas:

  • Blog - Technical articles and explorations
  • Research - Publications, white papers, and academic work
  • Teaching - Courses, workshops, and educational materials
  • Misc - Tools, references, and other useful resources
